member.summary: Intersects the rectangle with other rectangle and returns intersected rectangle.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Primitives2D.RectangleExtennsions.Intersect(DotImaging.Primitives2D.Rectangle,DotImaging.Primitives2D.Size,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates intersected rectangle from specified area (transformed into rectangle with location (0,0)) which can be useful for image area intersections.
member.param: Maximum bounding box represented as size.
If true the size components will be cropped by equal amount. If false the size ratio will not be checked.

member.param: Width / height ratio that must be satisfied.

member.name: T:DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point

member.summary: An uninitialized Point structure.

member.summary: Produces a Point structure from a PointF structure by taking the ceiling of the X and Y properties.

member.summary: Produces a Point structure from a PointF structure by rounding the X and Y properties.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point.Truncate(DotImaging.Primitives2D.PointF)
member.summary: Produces a Point structure from a PointF structure by truncating the X and Y properties.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point.Add(DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point,DotImaging.Primitives2D.Size)
member.summary: Translates a Point by the positive of a specified size.

member.summary: Translates a Point by the negative of a specified size.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point.op_Addition(DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point,DotImaging.Primitives2D.Size)
member.summary: Translates a Point by the positive of a specified size.

member.summary: Translates a Point by the negative of a specified size.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point.op_Equality(DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point,DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point)
member.summary: Compares two Point objects. The return value is based on the equivalence of the X and Y properties of the two points.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point.op_Inequality(DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point,DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point)
member.summary: Compares two Point objects. The return value is based on the equivalence of the X and Y properties of the two points.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point.op_Explicit(DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point)~DotImaging.Primitives2D.Size
member.summary: Returns a Size based on the Coordinates of a given Point. Requires explicit cast.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point.op_Implicit(DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point)~DotImaging.Primitives2D.PointF
member.summary: Creates a PointF based on the coordinates of a given Point. No explicit cast is required.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a Point from an integer which holds the Y coordinate in the high order 16 bits and the X coordinate in the low order 16 bits.

member.summary: Creates a Point from a Size value.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a PointF from a specified x,y coordinate pair.

member.name: P:DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point.IsEmpty
member.summary: Indicates if both X and Y are zero.

member.name: P:DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point.X
member.summary: Gets or sets X value.

member.name: P:DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point.Y
member.summary: Gets or sets Y value.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Primitives2D.Point.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks equivalence of this PointF and another object.
member.returns: True if the provided object is equal to this structure, false otherwise.
